name: Don't Crash!
description:
The aim of the game is simple, DON'T CRASH!

Control the endless stream of traffic by tapping on the car to make it stop and tapping again to send it on its way. Make sure all the cars make it through to progress to the next level.

Make sure you keep your cool though otherwise madness will unfold and a massive collision will end your game.

Don't Crash features:
- One tap gameplay to stop the traffic
- Addictive level design that will leave you wanting more
- Fun and colourful graphics
- Get the chance to explore new areas
